title: A Mysterious Disappearance in Bristol: Episode 91
itunes:subtitle: It was a week before Christmas, 2010\. One young couple in Bristol had everything to look forward to as they started their lives together. But then when Greg Reardon returned from a weekend away visiting family there was no sign of his girlfriend, Joan...
content:encoded:
It was a week before Christmas, 2010. One young couple in Bristol had everything to look forward to as they started their lives together. But then when Greg Reardon returned from a weekend away visiting family there was no sign of his girlfriend, Joanna Yeates. Just where was she?

Have you enjoyed the podcast and want more? Listen to 17 bonus episodes plus other exclusive content at www.patreon.com/uktruecrime
